summary:
[audio missing from first 3 min] Music Information Retrieval technology
has gotten good enough that you extract musical metadata from your sound
files with some degree of accuracy. Find out how to use Python (along
with third- party APIs) to determine everything from the key/tempo of a
song to the pitch/timbre of individual notes. Then we'll do some amusing
analysis of popular tunes.
title: Extracting musical information from sound
